Package com.example.ex3_goldman_nachman

Class Crawler

java.lang.Object
com.example.ex3_goldman_nachman.Crawler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Crawler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
This class implements Runnable and the implements Crawler functionality - by getPageImgs function, the function search for images in given URL.

  • Method Details

    • getPageImgs

      public void getPageImgs​(java.lang.String URL, int depth)
      Parameters:
      URL - ,the current url to be looked for his images by getPageImgs function.
      depth - ,,the current max depth to search of images. A recursive function that crawls for images, and summarize them.
